tool_description: Adjust the contrast of an image that is too dark or too bright to make the image more vivid.
name: Enhance image contrast
title: Enhance image contrast

api_list.name: Enhance image contrast

required_parameters.name: image
required_parameters.description:
- **Image format**: `PNG` `JPG` `JPEG` `BMP`
- **Image size**: No more than 8 MB.
- **Image resolution**: Larger than 10x10px, smaller than 5000x5000px.
- **Image aspect ratio**: Aspect ratio within 4:1.
